casebody.data:
Brenda ROBINSON
v.
Richard Curtis GARDNER and Pike Electric, Inc.
Cory R. Robinson
v.
Richard Curtis Gardner and Pike Electric, Inc. No. 73P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Allen C. Smith, Heather T. Twiddy, Charlotte, for Gardner & Pike Electric. Robert A. Karney, Cynthia V. McNeeley, E. Fitzgerald Parnell, III, Richard D. Poling, Charlotte, for Robinson.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st day of February 2005 by Defendants (Gardner and Pike Electric) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
